discord_bot_tools.description: A comprehensive collection of Discord bot tools for managing applications, channels, messages, guilds, users, emojis, stickers, webhooks, and more.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Create a new global application command.

parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the command (1-32 chars, lowercase, letters/numbers/underscores only)
parameters.type: number (optional) - Type of command (default: 1 = CHAT_INPUT, 2 = USER, 3 = MESSAGE)
parameters.options: string (optional) - JSON string of command options
parameters.default_member_permissions: string (optional) - JSON string of default member permissions
parameters.dm_permission: boolean (optional) - Whether command can be used in DMs (default: true)
parameters.nsfw: boolean (optional) - Whether command is NSFW (default: false)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Delete a global application command.

parameters.command_id: string (Required) - ID of the command to delete

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Update a global application command.

parameters.command_id: string (Required) - ID of the command to update
parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the command
parameters.description: string (optional) - New description for the command
parameters.options: string (optional) - JSON string of command options
parameters.default_member_permissions: string (optional) - JSON string of default member permissions
parameters.dm_permission: boolean (optional) - Whether command can be used in DMs (default: true)
parameters.nsfw: boolean (optional) - Whether command is NSFW (default: false)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Fetch a global application command.

parameters.command_id: string (Required) - ID of the command to fetch

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_APPLICATION_COMMANDS
tools.description: Fetch all global commands for an application.

parameters.with_localizations: boolean (optional) - Whether to include localization data (default: false)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_APPLICATION_COMMAND_PERMISSIONS
tools.description: Get permissions for a specific global command.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_APPLICATION_COMMAND_PERMISSIONS
tools.description: Get all permissions for all global commands.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_GUILD_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Create a new guild application command.

parameters.guild_id: string (Required) - ID of the guild where the command will be created
parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the command (1-32 chars, lowercase, letters/numbers/underscores only)
parameters.options: string (optional) - JSON string of command options
parameters.default_member_permissions: string (optional) - JSON string of default member permissions
parameters.dm_permission: boolean (optional) - Whether command can be used in DMs (default: true)
parameters.nsfw: boolean (optional) - Whether command is NSFW (default: false)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_GUILD_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Delete a guild application command.

parameters.guild_id: string (Required) - ID of the guild where the command is located
parameters.command_id: string (Required) - ID of the command to delete

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Update a guild application command.

parameters.guild_id: string (Required) - ID of the guild where the command is located
parameters.command_id: string (Required) - ID of the command to update
parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the command
parameters.description: string (optional) - New description for the command
parameters.options: string (optional) - JSON string of command options
parameters.default_member_permissions: string (optional) - JSON string of default member permissions
parameters.dm_permission: boolean (optional) - Whether command can be used in DMs (default: true)
parameters.nsfw: boolean (optional) - Whether command is NSFW (default: false)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_APPLICATION_COMMAND
tools.description: Fetch a guild application command.

parameters.command_id: string (Required) - ID of the command to fetch

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_APPLICATION_COMMANDS
tools.description: Fetch all guild commands for an application.

parameters.with_localizations: boolean (optional) - Whether to include localization data (default: false)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_APPLICATION_COMMAND_PERMISSIONS
tools.description: Get permissions for a specific command in a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_APPLICATION_COMMAND_PERMISSIONS
tools.description: Get all permissions for all commands in a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_APPLICATION
tools.description: Get information about an application.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_APPLICATION
tools.description: Update an application.

parameters.application_id: string (Required) - ID of the application to update
parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the application
parameters.description: string (optional) - New description for the application
parameters.icon: string (optional) - New icon for the application (base64 encoded image data)
parameters.cover_image: string (optional) - New cover image for the application (base64 encoded image data)
parameters.flags: number (optional) - New flags for the application
parameters.tags: string (optional) - JSON string of tags for the application
parameters.install_params: string (optional) - JSON string of installation parameters

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_MY_APPLICATION
tools.description: Get information about the current application.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_MY_APPLICATION
tools.description: Update the current application.

parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the application
parameters.description: string (optional) - New description for the application
parameters.icon: string (optional) - New icon for the application (base64 encoded image data)
parameters.cover_image: string (optional) - New cover image for the application (base64 encoded image data)
parameters.flags: number (optional) - New flags for the application
parameters.tags: string (optional) - JSON string of tags for the application
parameters.install_params: string (optional) - JSON string of installation parameters

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_APPLICATION_ROLE_CONNECTION_METADATA_RECORDS
tools.description: Get metadata records for an application's role connections.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_APPLICATION_ROLE_CONNECTION_METADATA_RECORDS
tools.description: Update metadata records for an application's role connections.

parameters.records: string (Required) - JSON string of metadata records

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_CHANNEL
tools.description: Get a channel by ID.

parameters.channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the channel to get

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_CHANNEL
tools.description: Update a channel's settings.

parameters.channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the channel to update
parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the channel
parameters.position: number (optional) - New position of the channel
parameters.topic: string (optional) - New topic for the channel
parameters.nsfw: boolean (optional) - Whether the channel is NSFW
parameters.rate_limit_per_user: number (optional) - Rate limit per user in seconds
parameters.user_limit: number (optional) - User limit for voice channels
parameters.permission_overwrites: string (optional) - JSON string of permission overwrites
parameters.parent_id: string (optional) - ID of the parent category
parameters.rtc_region: string (optional) - RTC region for voice channels
parameters.available_tags: string (optional) - JSON string of available tags
parameters.default_reaction_emoji: string (optional) - JSON string of default reaction emoji
parameters.default_thread_rate_limit_per_user: number (optional) - Default thread rate limit per user
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for the update (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_CHANNEL
tools.description: Delete a channel.

parameters.channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the channel to delete
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for deletion (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_CHANNEL_INVITES
tools.description: Get all invites for a channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_SET_CHANNEL_PERMISSION_OVERWRITE
tools.description: Edit channel permission overwrites for a user or role.

parameters.overwrite_id: string (Required) - ID of the user or role to set permissions for
parameters.allow: string (optional) - Permission bitwise value for allowed permissions (use '0' for none)
parameters.deny: string (optional) - Permission bitwise value for denied permissions (use '0' for none)
parameters.type: number (optional) - Type of overwrite (0 = role, 1 = member)
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for setting permissions (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_CHANNEL_PERMISSION_OVERWRITE
tools.description: Delete a channel permission overwrite for a user or role.

parameters.overwrite_id: string (Required) - ID of the user or role

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_FOLLOW_CHANNEL
tools.description: Follow a News Channel to send messages to a target channel.

parameters.channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the news channel to follow
parameters.webhook_channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the channel where messages will be posted

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_TRIGGER_TYPING_INDICATOR
tools.description: Post a typing indicator for the specified channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_THREAD
tools.description: Create a new thread from an existing channel.

parameters.channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the channel to create thread in
parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the thread
parameters.type: number (optional) - Type of thread (default: 11 = PUBLIC_THREAD, 10 = NEWS_THREAD, 12 = PRIVATE_THREAD)
parameters.auto_archive_duration: number (optional) - Duration in minutes to automatically archive the thread (0 = disabled)
parameters.invitable: boolean (optional) - Whether non-moderators can add other non-moderators to the thread
parameters.rate_limit_per_user: number (optional) - Amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the thread (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_THREAD_FROM_MESSAGE
tools.description: Create a new thread from an existing message.

parameters.channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the channel containing the message
parameters.message_id: string (Required) - ID of the message to create thread from
parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the thread
parameters.auto_archive_duration: number (optional) - Duration in minutes to automatically archive the thread (0 = disabled)
parameters.rate_limit_per_user: number (optional) - Amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the thread (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_JOIN_THREAD
tools.description: Add the current user to a thread.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LEAVE_THREAD
tools.description: Remove the current user from a thread.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_THREAD_MEMBER
tools.description: Return a thread member object for the specified user.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_THREAD_MEMBER
tools.description: Remove another member from a thread.

parameters.user_id: string (Required) - ID of the user to remove

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_THREAD_MEMBERS
tools.description: Return array of thread members objects that are members of the thread.

parameters.with_member: boolean (optional) - Whether to include the guild member object for each thread member
parameters.after: string (optional) - Get thread members after this user ID
parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of thread members to return (0 = default)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_PUBLIC_ARCHIVED_THREADS
tools.description: Return archived threads in the channel that are public.

parameters.before: string (optional) - Get threads before this thread ID
parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of threads to return (0 = default)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_PRIVATE_ARCHIVED_THREADS
tools.description: Return archived threads in the channel that are private.

parameters.before: string (optional) - Get threads before this thread ID
parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of threads to return (0 = default)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_JOINED_PRIVATE_ARCHIVED_THREADS
tools.description: Return archived threads in the channel that are private and the current user has joined.

parameters.before: string (optional) - Get threads before this thread ID
parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of threads to return (0 = default)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_ACTIVE_THREADS
tools.description: Return all active threads in the channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Create a new message in a channel.

parameters.allowed_mentions: string (optional) - JSON string of allowed mentions
parameters.message_reference: string (optional) - JSON string of message reference
parameters.sticker_ids: string (optional) - JSON string of sticker IDs
parameters.files: string (optional) - JSON string of file paths or file objects

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_MESSAGE
tools.description: Get a specific message.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Update a message.

parameters.allowed_mentions: string (optional) - JSON string of allowed mentions
parameters.files: string (optional) - JSON string of file paths or file objects

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Delete a message.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_MESSAGES
tools.description: Return the messages for a channel.

parameters.around: string (optional) - Get messages around this message ID
parameters.before: string (optional) - Get messages before this message ID
parameters.after: string (optional) - Get messages after this message ID
parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of messages to return (default: 50)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_PIN_MESSAGE
tools.description: Pin a message in a channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UNPIN_MESSAGE
tools.description: Unpin a message in a channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_PINNED_MESSAGES
tools.description: Return all pinned messages in the channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_ADD_MY_MESSAGE_REACTION
tools.description: Create a reaction for the message.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_MY_MESSAGE_REACTION
tools.description: Delete a reaction the current user has made for the message.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_USER_MESSAGE_REACTION
tools.description: Delete another user's reaction.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_ALL_MESSAGE_REACTIONS
tools.description: Delete all reactions on a message.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_ALL_MESSAGE_REACTIONS_BY_EMOJI
tools.description: Delete all the reactions for the given emoji on a message.

parameters.emoji: string (Required) - Emoji to remove all reactions for

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_MESSAGE_REACTIONS_BY_EMOJI
tools.description: Get a list of users that reacted with this emoji.

parameters.emoji: string (Required) - Emoji to get reactions for
parameters.after: string (optional) - Get users after this user ID
parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of users to return (default: 25)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_BULK_DELETE_MESSAGES
tools.description: Delete multiple messages in a single request.

parameters.messages: array (Required) - List of message IDs to delete

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CROSSPOST_MESSAGE
tools.description: Crosspost a message in a News Channel to following channels.

parameters.channel_id: string (Required) - ID of the news channel
parameters.message_id: string (Required) - ID of the message to crosspost

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_AUTO_MODERATION_RULE
tools.description: Create a new auto moderation rule for a Discord guild.

parameters.guild_id: string (Required) - ID of the guild where the rule will be created
parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the auto moderation rule
parameters.event_type: number (Required) - Type of event that triggers the rule (1 = MESSAGE_SEND)
parameters.trigger_type: number (Required) - Type of trigger for the rule (1 = KEYWORD, 2 = SPAM, 3 = KEYWORD_PRESET, 4 = MENTION_SPAM)
parameters.trigger_metadata: string (optional) - JSON string of trigger-specific metadata
parameters.actions: string (optional) - JSON string of actions to take when rule is triggered
parameters.enabled: boolean (optional) - Whether the rule is enabled (default: true)
parameters.exempt_roles: string (optional) - JSON string of role IDs exempt from the rule
parameters.exempt_channels: string (optional) - JSON string of channel IDs exempt from the rule
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the rule (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_AUTO_MODERATION_RULE
tools.description: Get a single auto moderation rule.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_AUTO_MODERATION_RULES
tools.description: Get all auto moderation rules for a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_AUTO_MODERATION_RULE
tools.description: Modify an existing auto moderation rule.

parameters.rule_id: string (Required) - ID of the rule to update
parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the rule
parameters.trigger_metadata: string (optional) - JSON string of trigger-specific metadata
parameters.actions: string (optional) - JSON string of actions to take when rule is triggered
parameters.enabled: boolean (optional) - Whether the rule is enabled
parameters.exempt_roles: string (optional) - JSON string of role IDs exempt from the rule
parameters.exempt_channels: string (optional) - JSON string of channel IDs exempt from the rule
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for updating the rule (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_AUTO_MODERATION_RULE
tools.description: Delete an auto moderation rule.

parameters.rule_id: string (Required) - ID of the rule to delete
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for deleting the rule (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_AUTO_MODERATION_RULE_EXECUTION
tools.description: Get an auto moderation rule execution.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_AUTO_MODERATION_RULE_EXECUTIONS
tools.description: List auto moderation rule executions.

parameters.before: string (optional) - Get executions before this execution ID
parameters.after: string (optional) - Get executions after this execution ID
parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of executions to return

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_GUILD
tools.description: Create a new guild.

parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the guild
parameters.afk_channel_id: string (optional) - ID of the AFK channel
parameters.system_channel_id: string (optional) - ID of the system channel

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD
tools.description: Get a guild by ID.

parameters.with_counts: boolean (optional) - Whether to include approximate member and presence counts

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD
tools.description: Update a guild's settings.

parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the guild
parameters.default_message_notifications: number (optional) - New default message notification level
parameters.explicit_content_filter: number (optional) - New explicit content filter level
parameters.afk_channel_id: string (optional) - New ID of the AFK channel
parameters.afk_timeout: number (optional) - New AFK timeout in seconds
parameters.system_channel_id: string (optional) - New ID of the system channel
parameters.rules_channel_id: string (optional) - New ID of the rules channel
parameters.public_updates_channel_id: string (optional) - New ID of the public updates channel
parameters.features: string (optional) - JSON string of guild features
parameters.description: string (optional) - New description for the guild
parameters.discovery_splash: string (optional) - New base64 encoded discovery splash
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for the update (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_GUILD
tools.description: Delete a guild permanently.

parameters.guild_id: string (Required) - ID of the guild to delete

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_CHANNELS
tools.description: Get all channels in a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_GUILD_CHANNEL
tools.description: Create a new channel in a guild.

parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the channel
parameters.user_limit: number (optional) - User limit for voice channels
parameters.rate_limit_per_user: number (optional) - Rate limit per user in seconds
parameters.permission_overwrites: string (optional) - JSON string of permission overwrites
parameters.parent_id: string (optional) - ID of the parent category
parameters.nsfw: boolean (optional) - Whether the channel is NSFW
parameters.rtc_region: string (optional) - RTC region for voice channels
parameters.default_reaction_emoji: string (optional) - JSON string of default reaction emoji
parameters.available_tags: string (optional) - JSON string of available tags
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the channel (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_CHANNEL_POSITIONS
tools.description: Update the positions of channels in a guild.

parameters.positions: string (Required) - JSON string of channel positions

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_ACTIVE_GUILD_THREADS
tools.description: List all active threads in a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_MEMBER
tools.description: Get a member of a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_MEMBERS
tools.description: List members of a guild.

parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of members to return
parameters.after: string (optional) - Get members after this user ID

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_SEARCH_GUILD_MEMBERS
tools.description: Search for members in a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_MEMBER
tools.description: Update a member of a guild.

parameters.nick: string (optional) - New nickname for the member
parameters.roles: string (optional) - JSON string of role IDs
parameters.mute: boolean (optional) - Whether to mute the member
parameters.deaf: boolean (optional) - Whether to deafen the member
parameters.channel_id: string (optional) - ID of the channel to move the member to
parameters.communication_disabled_until: string (optional) - When to remove the timeout
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for the update (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_GUILD_MEMBER
tools.description: Remove a member from a guild.

parameters.user_id: string (Required) - ID of the user to remove
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for removal (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_ADD_GUILD_MEMBER_ROLE
tools.description: Add a role to a guild member.

parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for adding the role (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_GUILD_MEMBER_ROLE
tools.description: Remove a role from a guild member.

parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for removing the role (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_BAN_USER_FROM_GUILD
tools.description: Ban a user from a guild.

parameters.user_id: string (Required) - ID of the user to ban
parameters.delete_message_days: number (optional) - Number of days of messages to delete (0-7)
parameters.delete_message_seconds: number (optional) - Number of seconds of messages to delete
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for the ban (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UNBAN_USER_FROM_GUILD
tools.description: Remove a ban for a user from a guild.

parameters.user_id: string (Required) - ID of the user to unban
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for the unban (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_BANS
tools.description: Get all bans for a guild.

parameters.limit: number (optional) - Maximum number of bans to return
parameters.before: string (optional) - Get bans before this user ID
parameters.after: string (optional) - Get bans after this user ID

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_BAN
tools.description: Get a ban for a user in a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_GUILD_ROLE
tools.description: Create a new role in a guild.

parameters.name: string (optional) - Name of the role
parameters.hoist: boolean (optional) - Whether the role is hoisted
parameters.unicode_emoji: string (optional) - Unicode emoji for the role
parameters.mentionable: boolean (optional) - Whether the role is mentionable
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the role (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_ROLE_POSITIONS
tools.description: Update the positions of roles in a guild.

parameters.positions: string (Required) - JSON string of role positions

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_ROLE
tools.description: Update a role in a guild.

parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the role
parameters.color: number (optional) - New color of the role
parameters.hoist: boolean (optional) - Whether the role is hoisted
parameters.unicode_emoji: string (optional) - New unicode emoji for the role
parameters.mentionable: boolean (optional) - Whether the role is mentionable
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for updating the role (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_GUILD_ROLE
tools.description: Delete a role from a guild.

parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for deleting the role (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_ROLES
tools.description: Get all roles in a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_GUILD_EMOJI
tools.description: Create a new emoji for the guild.

parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the emoji
parameters.roles: array (optional) - List of role IDs allowed to use this emoji
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the emoji (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_EMOJI
tools.description: Return an emoji object for the given guild and emoji IDs.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_EMOJI
tools.description: Modify the given emoji.

parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the emoji
parameters.roles: array (optional) - New list of role IDs allowed to use this emoji
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for updating the emoji (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_GUILD_EMOJI
tools.description: Delete the given emoji.

parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for deleting the emoji (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_EMOJIS
tools.description: Return a list of emoji objects for the given guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_GUILD_STICKER
tools.description: Create a new sticker for the guild.

parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the sticker
parameters.file: string (Required) - File path or file object for the sticker
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the sticker (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_STICKER
tools.description: Return a sticker object for the given guild and sticker IDs.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_STICKER
tools.description: Modify the given sticker.

parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the sticker
parameters.description: string (optional) - New description for the sticker
parameters.tags: string (optional) - New tags for the sticker
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for updating the sticker (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_GUILD_STICKER
tools.description: Delete the given sticker.

parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for deleting the sticker (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_STICKERS
tools.description: Return a list of sticker objects for the given guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_STICKER_PACKS
tools.description: Return the list of sticker packs available to Nitro subscribers.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_STICKER
tools.description: Return a sticker object for the given sticker ID.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Create a new webhook.

parameters.name: string (Required) - Name of the webhook
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the webhook (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Return the new webhook object for the given id.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Modify a webhook.

parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the webhook
parameters.channel_id: string (optional) - New channel ID for the webhook
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for updating the webhook (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Delete a webhook permanently.

parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for deleting the webhook (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_WEBHOOK_BY_TOKEN
tools.description: Return the new webhook object for the given id.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_WEBHOOK_BY_TOKEN
tools.description: Modify a webhook using its token.

parameters.name: string (optional) - New name for the webhook
parameters.channel_id: string (optional) - New channel ID for the webhook

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_WEBHOOK_BY_TOKEN
tools.description: Delete a webhook using its token.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_EXECUTE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Execute a webhook to send a message.

parameters.avatar_url: string (optional) - Override the default avatar URL
parameters.allowed_mentions: string (optional) - JSON string of allowed mentions
parameters.files: string (optional) - JSON string of file paths or file objects
parameters.thread_name: string (optional) - Name of the thread to create
parameters.thread_id: string (optional) - ID of the thread to send the message to
parameters.wait: boolean (optional) - Whether to wait for server confirmation

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_EXECUTE_SLACK_COMPATIBLE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Execute a webhook with a Slack-compatible payload.

parameters.wait: boolean (optional) - Whether to wait for server confirmation
parameters.thread_id: string (optional) - ID of the thread to send the message to

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_EXECUTE_GITHUB_COMPATIBLE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Execute a webhook with a GitHub-compatible payload.

parameters.wait: boolean (Required) - Whether to wait for server confirmation
parameters.thread_id: string (Required) - ID of the thread to send the message to

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_WEBHOOK_MESSAGE
tools.description: Get a message sent by a webhook.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_WEBHOOK_MESSAGE
tools.description: Update a message sent by a webhook.

parameters.allowed_mentions: string (optional) - JSON string of allowed mentions
parameters.files: string (optional) - JSON string of file paths or file objects

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_WEBHOOK_MESSAGE
tools.description: Delete a message sent by a webhook.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_CHANNEL_WEBHOOKS
tools.description: Get all webhooks for a channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_WEBHOOKS
tools.description: Get all webhooks for a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_CREATE_CHANNEL_INVITE
tools.description: Create a new invite for a channel.

parameters.max_age: number (optional) - Duration of invite in seconds (0 = never expires)
parameters.max_uses: number (optional) - Max number of uses (0 = unlimited)
parameters.temporary: boolean (optional) - Whether this invite only grants temporary membership
parameters.unique: boolean (optional) - If true, don't try to reuse a similar invite
parameters.target_type: number (optional) - Type of target for voice channel invites
parameters.target_user_id: string (optional) - ID of the user whose stream to display
parameters.target_application_id: string (optional) - ID of the embedded application
parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for creating the invite (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_CHANNEL_INVITES
tools.description: Get all invites for a channel.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_LIST_GUILD_INVITES
tools.description: Get all invites for a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_DELETE_INVITE
tools.description: Delete an invite.

parameters.reason: string (optional) - Reason for deleting the invite (for audit logs)

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_INVITE
tools.description: Get an invite by its code.

parameters.with_counts: boolean (optional) - Whether to include approximate member counts
parameters.with_expiration: boolean (optional) - Whether to include expiration date
parameters.guild_scheduled_event_id: string (optional) - ID of the guild scheduled event

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_VANITY_URL
tools.description: Get the vanity URL for a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_WIDGET
tools.description: Get the widget for a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_GET_GUILD_WIDGET_SETTINGS
tools.description: Get the widget settings for a guild.

tools.name: DISCORDBOT_UPDATE_GUILD_WIDGET_SETTINGS
tools.description: Update the widget settings for a guild.

parameters.enabled: boolean (optional) - Whether the widget is enabled
parameters.channel_id: string (optional) - ID of the widget channel
